Package Representation

Class InnerNode

java.lang.Object
Representation.Node
Representation.InnerNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
Event, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ChanceNode, ChooseNode, FightNode, TestNode, TextNode
public abstract class InnerNode extends Node
Represents an inner node in the game's narrative structure. Extends the Node class to inherit basic node functionality.
See Also:
